mapper.select: select m.coupon_idx ,c.cp_idx,cp_name, cp_cate, expire_date, cp_price, cp_const from coupon C, mycoupon M where m.m_code = #{m_code} and m.cp_idx = c.cp_idx
SELECT * FROM coupon ORDER BY cp_idx DESC LIMIT #{param1} , #{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon(cp_idx, cp_name, cp_cate, cp_price, cp_const, issue_date, expire_date) VALUES (seq_cp_idx.nextval, #{cp_name}, #{cp_cate}, #{cp_price}, #{cp_const}, STR_TO_DATE(#{issue_date},'%m-%d-%Y'),STR_TO_DATE(#{expire_date},'%m-%d-%Y') )
